name: HERO XTREME
description: joint venture between India's largest bicycle manufacturing company Hero Cycles and Japanese motorcycle brand HONDA.
details: The Xtreme 200s sports a stylish look, exudes a commanding presence and makes sure you always stay connected. It's where power and style meet to ensure you take over the city.

name: HERO XPULSE
description: Take your adventures to the next level with a light-weight all-terrain motorcycle....
details: Take your adventures to the next level with a light-weight all-terrain motorcycle that’s perfect for everyday rides as well as your action on the weekends. The Xpulse 200 is equipped with tech features as well!

name: HERO XPULSE 200T
description: urban, highways or rural, this is a modern bike....
details: If the long road is where you belong this one is for you. Built for all roads – urban, highways or rural, this is a modern bike with a retro flavor that is also equipped with the best tech features.

name: pulsar-250
description: Dynamic interplay of premium metallised dual colours. Darker in the front and lighter towards the rear....
details: Never run out of juice. A wide torque band offers 85% of peak power over a wider rev range-than other motorcycles in the segment.

name: GIXXER 155CC
description: Here is the latest version of your favorite street sport bike with the same engine specifications ....
details: Here is the latest version of your favorite street sport bike with the same engine specifications and engine test as the Gixxer. With its new advanced Disc-Brake, it promises a really fabulous, more stable and more confident riding experience on all kinds of terrain.

name: NEW GIXXER SF
description: The All-New Gixxer SF 155, from the makers of Hayabusa and GSX-R, comes the latest from a lineage of legends. The generational update makes the Suzuki Gixxer...
details: The All-New Gixxer SF 155, from the makers of Hayabusa and GSX-R, comes the latest from a lineage of legends. The generational update makes the Suzuki Gixxer SF look more premium and sportier than before. It gets edgier styling, clip-on handlebars, and a split seat to complete the effect. The Suzuki Gixxer SF has impressive quality and fit and finish levels. It comes in three colors: Glass Sparkle Black, Mira Red, and the 100 Years Anniversary Edition comes with Solitary Silver

name: GIXXER 155CC
description: Here is the latest version of your favorite street sport bike with the same engine specifications and engine test as the Gixxer. With its new advanced Disc-Brake...
details: Here is the latest version of your favorite street sport bike with the same engine specifications and engine test as the Gixxer. With its new advanced Disc-Brake, it promises a really fabulous, more stable and more confident riding experience on all kinds of terrain.
